import React from "react"; import classes from './Navbar.module.css' import { Link, Navigate } from 'react-router-dom' import {AiOutlineShoppingCart, AiOutlineUser} from 'react-icons/ai' import {useState} from 'react'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; const Navbar = () => { const[isScrolled,setIsScrolled] = useState(false) const dispatch = useDispatch() const navigate = useNavigate() window.onscroll = ()=>{ setIsScrolled(window.pageYOffset === 0 ? false : true) // return () =>(window.onscroll = null) //removing the scrolled event } const handleLogout = ()=>{ dispatch(logout()) Navigate('/login') } return (

0
) } export default Navbar
